reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and great for winter wear, appreciating its soft, luxurious feel and comfortable, non-itchy material. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it slightly oversized while others say the length is perfect.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this sweater
items.body: Buy this sweater!! It is exactly as pictured not too thick not too thin this is the perfect staple sweater the color is perfect might even be a little brighter. The length is perfect I have slightly longer arms so stuff hardly fits tight and this is perfect with a little extra give. The softness is great very warm cozy sweater. Love that doesn‚Äôt fit to wide or too tight it‚Äôs loose but not too loose. The shape is great. Read more
items.author: Lilly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT!!! ITS A GREAT SWEATER
items.body: I have 3 other sweaters from this brand and I love this one just as much !!!! Great thickness and color! Not itchy and looks like it came from banana republic or j crew. It‚Äôs a great warm sweater , just a tad oversized . Hits right below the waist and easy to do a front tuck in your jeans . Love it !!!! Read more
items.author: clarissa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and warm
items.body: Good thickness and colors as shown (got in green and the bright blue). The length is great as I'm taller and I don't need to tuck it in, but if you're shorter this could be a great option too. Hopefully will wash well. I went back and bought a second after the first arrived. The material is comfortable and not scratchy either. Read more
items.author: breanne begay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great buy
items.body: I love this sweater. It is warm, well made and the perfect pink color. I am tall and the length of the sweater and arms is perfect. Very soft. Washes well and true to size. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: Love! Wear it all the time. Soft, thick, warm, cute design. Great sweater. Definitely worth it Read more
items.author: KEndall LeMaster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. The fit is loose and comfortable and the color is beautiful. It's warm and cozy. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection in a Sweaterüî•
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am 5‚Äô8, 215lbs and brought an XL. However, I definitely should‚Äôve gotten a Large or Medium. So size down as this sweater is somewhat weighted and larger in size. I brought this sweater for holiday photos and it was perfect. The material was not that itchy annoying material, it was super soft. It gave the 90s vibe that I was looking for in my photos! Read more
items.author: ’º…õ ü ü è ñ®Ü

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed!
items.body: The sweater was soft, but after one day of wear, it was all snagged. And by the end of the day, it eventually had a hole in it. Disappointed!! Style and fit were cute and oversized. Read more
items.author: kkzick

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige White, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Apricot, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Dark Red, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
